mob.name: (a huge mound of moss and rock)

mobs.long_desc: You see a vaguely humanoid shape moving through the mists.
mobs.desc: It's difficult to make out the shape of the creature before you.  Though roughly humanoid in form, it stands taller than most humans, with its features and exact nature shrouded in a kind of grey mist.  It moves with a quiet, cunning grace.

mobs.long_desc: You see a vaguely wolf-like shape moving through the mists.
mobs.desc: Constantly snarling, this beast almost appears lupine in nature, though its exact form and features are shrouded in a sort of grey mist that makes it appear to be almost a silhouette, perhaps of some wolf's shadow.

mobs.long_desc: Something rises out of the mud, crawling toward you on what looks like four paws.
mobs.desc: This creature, at first glance, looks like some sort of stalky tortoise, covered in mud.  However, as you look closer, the dripping mud only uncovers more mud, which expands continually outward, making the actualy shape of this beast somewhat vague.  It seems to be some sort of animation of the tainted earth along the trail.

mobs.long_desc: A heap of moss and algae advances toward you, rising up on two legs.
mobs.desc: The shapeless green heap only has two distinct features: two short, thick limbs which hold it above the ground, and shamble your way.  Occationally, new appendages emerge from the mass, reaching out to find new victims.

mobs.long_desc: A hideous creature with an octopus-like head stands here.
mobs.desc: You see a young-looking, but hideous, creature standing about 5 feet tall with mauve colored skin that glistens with slime. Its head resembles an octopus, with white eyes and four tentacles where a mouth should be.

mobs.long_desc: A mild mannered merchant walks about here.
mobs.desc: You see a mild mannered merchant walking through the Blue Fog. He may be a little lost as he wanders to and fro, but he's certain that he will reach his destination eventually as long as he doesn't stray too far from the beaten trail. He looks harmless enough.

mobs.keywords: storm guardian guard turbulent swirl cloud swirling
mobs.long_desc: A turbulent, swirling cloud mingles with the surroundings.
mobs.desc: This cloud is a deep mixture of swirling grey and silver tendrils.  She seems to reach out toward everything and everyone nearby, scarcely settling on simple contact.  Her entire body is quite important, since there is nothing which can be described as a central portion of her being.  There are occasional black welts, floating among her cloudy form, which do not seem to serve any specific purpose.

mobs.keywords: mysa cloudy shaded myst dragon myst-dragon her
mobs.long_desc: A cloudy shaded myst dragon rests here upon her treasure.
mobs.desc: This fierce female dragon is colossal.  She has mottled grey skin and dull, piercing eyes.  Her underbelly is a lighter, white color, leading down to her vicious tail with a sharp tip.  Mysa's claws are many and pointed.  She rests atop vast piles of treasure which fills the entirety of her home.  She has a few dark colored patches of skin struggling to push their way through her otherwise dull shades.

mobs.keywords: myst guardian guard myst-guardian thick cloud mist
mobs.long_desc: A thick cloud is here, enveloping the surroundings.
mobs.desc: This myst guardian is rather clear and tall, yet seems to spread out over a large area.  He surrounds what comes near, yet can nearly be seen through without any special effort.  He is vaguely humanoid, yet really possessing none of the common humanoid features.  The myst guardian does not even seem to have what could be described as a head, but rather seems to reguard his entire being as important.

mobs.long_desc: &7&bA thick cloud is here enveloping the surroundings.&0
mobs.desc: The mist is thick and sometimes thin, never seeming to hold still.

mobs.long_desc: A swirling gray colored mist demon floats here.
mobs.desc: This gray swirling mist demon is rather oddly shaped.  There is no discernible head or other extremities and it simply floats around.  It would almost seem to vanish into any fog which might be around, able to strike at any time.  There are no special markings on it, other than one large crescent shaped black streak on the right side of the demon's body.

mobs.long_desc: A torn and ugly tree stands here firmly planted.
mobs.desc: This tree is hideous.  It has no redeeming look about it at all.  The trunk is narrow and blackened, and appears to be perpetually damp from the surrounding countryside.  There are some small holes in the wood, which seem to be filled with something unknown.  The branches are a lighter shade of black, and the leaves are a sickly color of green, dark and unattractive.

mobs.long_desc: A slender temple guard stands here, partially blocking the entrance.
mobs.desc: This guard is a pale blue color.  His skin is aged beyond recognizable years, and is stretched tightly over his bony frame.  He looks like a typical humanoid might, two legs and two arms and a head between his shoulders, with a noticable difference.  He has a large hollow in the center of his stomach, yet nothing from within his body leaks out.

mobs.long_desc: A stream of mist, weaving back and forth.
mobs.desc: The mist is a thick fog, almost substantial in substance, yet not quite tangible to grab hold of.  There is a bright red contrasting glow from the center of the demon.

mobs.long_desc: A graceful little wave laps calmly at the walls.
mobs.desc: This simple little wave gently laps against the walls, causing no erosion of any kind.  The color of the water is a delicate blue, darker than the color of the sky and far more brilliant than the color of the water on the walls.  The wave sways left to right, right to left, and occasionally swirls about as if it is enjoying itself.

mobs.long_desc: A vast swirl of air whisps around.
mobs.desc: The air swirls in circles, not paying any attention to anything or not minding when it bumps into a wall.  The windy swirls seem confined and unmoving, yet oddly free and mobile.

mobs.long_desc: A thick fog floats around, lingering about all within reach.
mobs.desc: This creature is nothing more than a rich coalescence of fog which obviously has accumulated from the vast amounts of mist around here.  There is no discernible anatomy to the creature, simply a large mass that could pass for the bulk of the creature.  It is a dark grey color, with a few whisps of silver swirling about the mass.  There are a few massive tendrils stemming out from the center of the creature.

mobs.keywords: squirrel wise cunning sharp-eyed puffy tailed critter
mobs.long_desc: A cunning, sharp-eyed puffy-tailed critter sits here atop the peak.
mobs.desc: With a large, bushy tail, this squirrel sits atop the peek of the Mountain of Mist keeping an eye out upon all of the surrounding lands. The squirrel appears to be quite knowledgable and astute.  Around its mouth the already grey hairs seem a little more white with age than the rest of its silky fur.

mobs.keywords: quajit qua jit qua_jit small circular creature
mobs.long_desc: A small, circular creature rocks back and forth here.
mobs.desc: This creature is a small bundle of fur with a hole through its center.  The qua-jit is rather fluffy and has the ability to nestle its face deeply into its fur and then make it resurface elsewhere.  It has an odd collection of claw-tipped toes attached to five legs which seem to protrude from its body randomly.  The qua-jit's fur is a fiery bloom of red and orange, with streaks of golden-yellow mingled in periodically.

mobs.keywords: ooze tremendous great translucent green cube
mobs.long_desc: A great translucent green cube jiggles back and forth here.
mobs.desc: This is a large cube of green slime.  This ooze is an odd construction of a curious, gelatinous mixture.  There are small bits of plant and animal visible deep within the goo of this creature, which have the apperance of being partially digested.  The ooze seems to lean toward any living tissue near it.

mobs.keywords: lightning streak intermittent flash blue light
mobs.long_desc: An intermittent flash of blue light wavers about here.
mobs.desc: This appears to be a continual bolt of energy from a storm.  The lightning flickers brighter and darker in a completely random pattern, never seeming to hold at one tint or in any one phase for more than a brief instant.  The light is a crystaline-blue color.

mobs.long_desc: Some gnarled vines lay twisted about the ground.
mobs.desc: This is just a large mass of vines, jumbled about and interwoven with themselves.  They are rather scruffy and beaten, looking as though they have often been attacked and stepped upon.  The vines are thick and green, with a sporadic assortment of black smudges all about them.

mobs.short_desc: a huge mound of moss and rock
mobs.long_desc: A mossy rockslide rolls toward you, against the slope of the mountain.
mobs.desc: The moss-covered rocks from the face of the mountain seem to have been caught up in a huge animation of plant matter.  The creature rolls toward it's victim, like a wave rolls up and crashes on the shore.

objects.ground: A silty potion has been left here.
A bright white potion is lying on the ground here.

extras.text: It is a bright, almost glowing white potion. The liquid in the glass vial is milky and opaque, and smells faintly of herbs.

objects.ground: A misty blue bracelet is lying here, shimmering slightly.

objects.short: a stick made of hardened leather
objects.ground: A small stick made of hardened leather lies here.
Someone has dropped a ruby splinter here.

extras.text: If it weren't for its bright red color, this precious splinter would go unnoticed because of its tiny size.  However, as soon as it is picked up it begins to emit a magical light.  It has clearly been enchanted.

objects.ground: A misty blue dagger has been dropped here.

extras.text: The dagger is made of a misty blue metal that seems to pulsate slightly.  The dagger's blade changes shape slowly as it grows new teeth to replace older teeth as they fade away.

objects.ground: A violet potion has been left here.
A dark potion has been left here.
A partially broken wooden sign is stuck in the path here.

extras.text: The sign is scratched as if an animal frequently sharpens its claws upon it. The upper right corner is broken off, taking some of the writing which was on the sign with it.  The sign reads: Be very wary wayward traveler.  From this point on the mi and the creatures more fierce than those previously encoun trail.  Be especially weary of the most sinister of them, called a by we unfortunate souls.  I was the first and last to escape the danger, and took it upon myself to return and place this warning. There is nothing further on the sign or post other than a thick damp caused no doubt by the fog surrounding everything here.

objects.ground: Some long bits of myst lie here, seeming to conform to the ground.

extras.text: These vambraces are of exceptional quality, and are simply bits of a magically bound myst.  They seem to conform to any shape of any arm which dons them, and seem to repel light and seem to absorb impacts and then quickly reform the dented portion.  The myst is a dull, absent grey color.
It looks like a lot of coins of various colors.

objects.ground: A thin layer of cloud rests upon the ground here.

extras.text: It is some mist, very fluffy.

objects.ground: Some partially digested bits of bone and plant.
A bolt of light flickers rapidly here.
This is a solid bit of old vine.

shops.no_such_item1: %s Haven't got that in storage, try LIST!
shops.no_such_item2: %s You can't sell what you don't HAVE!
shops.missing_cash1: %s I'd love to buy it, I just can't spare the coinage
shops.missing_cash2: %s Bah, come back when you can pay!
shops.message_sell: %s I'll give ya %d coins for that!

shops.no_such_item2: %s You don't have that, try INVENTORY!
shops.do_not_buy: %s What do I look like, a fence?
shops.missing_cash1: %s Sorry, I just can't afford such a costly item.
shops.message_buy: %s You're getting a bargain for that at only %d!
shops.message_sell: %s I guess I could give ya %d for that.

triggers.name: 11765_to_11766_south_exit
triggers.commands: wdoor 11765 south room 11766 wdoor 11765 south description A wall of fog is parted to the south, allowing passage. wdoor 11765 south name mistwall mistdoor wechoaround %actor% %actor.name% waves %actor.p% hands around causing the fog south to dissipate allowing passage. wsend %actor% By moving your hands you clear a passage through the fog to the south. wat 11766 wecho The fog to the north clears a little. wait 1 t wecho The fog slowly closes back around the exit to the south. wdoor 11765 south purge

triggers.name: branches_attack_rand
triggers.commands: wait 2 if %actor.vnum% == -1 &%actor.level% < 100 set dice1 %random.55% set dice2 %random.55% eval damage %dice1% + %dice2% set victim %random.char% wdamage %victim% %damage% slash if %damdone% == 0 wechoaround %victim% One of the branches suddenly whips out at %victim.name%! wsend %victim% A gnarled tree branch reached out and tried to slash you! else wechoaround %victim% One of the branches suddenly whips out at %victim.name%, cutting %victim.o%. (&4%damdone%&0) wsend %victim% A gnarled tree branch reached out and slashed you!! (&1%damdone%&0) end wait 3 s endif

triggers.name: mysa_death_dropcoins
triggers.commands: return 0 mecho With a mighty roar Mysa falls!! mload obj 11798 drop treasure mecho mecho A huge pile of treasure is now available upon the dragon's demise!

triggers.name: Mysa_Attack
triggers.commands: set val %random.10% switch %val% case 1 breath lightning break case 2 case 3 sweep break case 4 case 5 roar break default growl done

triggers.name: mist_caster_nofight
triggers.commands: mload obj 11800 return 0 mecho The mist begins to fall apart... drop ball mecho The violent magic has dispersed the mist temporarily. mpurge no-kill

triggers.name: mist_caster_rand_fog
triggers.commands: mset mist invis 100 wait 2 cast 'wall of fog'

triggers.name: room_reload_mob
triggers.commands: if %object.vnum% == 11800 wait 2s wpurge ball-mist wecho The mist begins to reform. wload mob 11800 endif

triggers.name: assassin_vine_greet
triggers.commands: if %actor.vnum% == -1 emote lunches toward %actor.name%. backstab %actor.name% endif

triggers.name: rock_fall_on_head
triggers.commands: wait 2 if %actor.level% < 100 set die1 %random.60% set die2 %random.60% eval damage %die1% + %die2% set victim %random.char% wdamage %victim% %damage% crush if %damdone% == 0 wechoaround %victim% A large stone slipped off of the entrance to a cave, but %victim.name% is unharmed. wsend %victim% A large rock from the cave entrace to the west just missed you! else wechoaround %victim% A large stone slipped off of the entrance to a cave to the west and hit %victim.name%. (&4%damdone%&0) wsend %victim% A large rock from the cave entrace to the west hits you in the head! (&1%damdone%&0) end wait 3 s end

triggers.name: mist_attack
triggers.commands: if ((%arg% == carving) || (%arg% == carvings)) return 1 set now %time.stamp% if ((%mist_loaded% != 1) && (%last_load% < %now% - 2)) set mist_loaded 1 global mist_loaded set last_load %now% global last_load wechoaround %actor% As %actor.name% looks at the carvings, an eerie stillness seems to set in... wsend %actor% As you look at the carvings, an eerie stillness seems to set in... wait 2s wload mob 11804 wecho The mist seem to come alive, filled with hostility! wechoaround %actor% The mist roars and charges at %actor.name%. wsend %actor% The mist roars and charges at YOU! wait 2 wforce mist-demon kill %actor.name% else wsend %actor% The mists around the carvings seem ominous and hostile. endif else return 0 endif

rooms.name: The Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: What was once a heavily travelled merchant road has now fallen into obvious disuse -- wheel ruts and the hoofprints of time have eroded into faint gouges and tracks along the packed earth of the trail.  To the north, the city of Meilikki can be seen rising up behind its walls and its gates.  To the south, however, a wall of fog rolls all the way out of view.  The fog is tinted a faint blue color that does not seem in the least natural, and things are obviously moving through it.

North.description: You can just barely make out the southern gate.

South.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the south.

rooms.name: The Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: A once-wide, once well-traveled road has become, over time and disuse, little more than a trail leading north to south.  A rolling, eerie blue fog rises up all around, from the very ground, making visibility all but impossible.  It is possible to see the beginning of a grassland plateau to the west, and a black, evil-seeming forest to the east, but neither of these is reachable from here.

North.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the north. There appears to be a town somewhere in the distance.

South.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the south.

rooms.name: The Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: A wide but obviously disused merchant road runs from the north to the south from here.  A dense, swirling fog limits visibility immensely.  Small noises emanate from all around in the blue-tinged fog, though the sources of those noises are not often seen.

North.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the north. Although you can hear it, you can't see a town from here.

South.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the south.

rooms.name: The Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: A wide dirt road runs north-south here.  Though once the road was widely and frequently travelled, it has now just as obviously fallen into disrepair and disuse -- there are no recent wheel ruts, and few hoofprints, to mark passage of merchants.  Instead, there are pawprints and queer sliding ruts caused by something living.  The blue-tinged fog rises up in swirls and tendrils all around.

North.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the north.

South.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the south.

rooms.name: The Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: A wide dirt road runs from the north to the south in a brackish, swampy kind of terrain.  The trail is obviously not often used.  Between the dense fog rising up from the very dirt of the road itself, to the lack of recent wheel or hoofprints, this trail seems very inaptly named.

North.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the north.

South.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the south.

rooms.name: The Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: This wide, dirt road was once frequently used, as its numerous wheel ruts and hoofprints attest.  But all of those ruts and prints are from long ago, almost completely flattened by time.  There are only a few brave merchants who brave this road!  A strange, eerie blue fog rises up from the very road, choking off all visibility for more than a few feet in any direction.  Not that there's a lot to see here, but even if there were, nobody would be seeing it.

North.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the north.

South.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the south.

rooms.name: The Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: A wide, dark dirt road runs from north to south in the middle of a dank, humid swamp.  Here and there a wheel rut or a hoofprint is visible, but those are old and almost erased by time.  The road has no boundaries, no borders, no gates.  Its source and destination are not marked anywhere.  A strange blue smoky fog swirls around from the very ground, defying vision.  To the east, a black, evil forest is vaguely visible, though it cannot be reached from here.

North.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the north.

South.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the south.

rooms.name: The Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: A dark, disused swampy dirt road runs from the north to the south from here. There are no markings of any kind on the road, and it is obvious by the lack of recent human, horse, or wheel prints on the ground that nobody uses this trail regularly.  A thick swirling fog rises up from the ground, and in the light, one could make out its blue tint.  It gets especially strong at the sides of the road, to the point of making passage to the east or west impossible.

North.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the north.

South.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the south.

rooms.name: The Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: A wide, dark merchant road that's fallen on hard times runs from north to south through land that gets danker and darker the further south one travels. A sound of water barely penetrates the light blue fog that permeates and swirls around this road.  Passage to the east and west is out of the question.

North.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the north.

South.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the south.

rooms.name: A Turn in the Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: The merchant road makes a sharp turn here to avoid a particularly unpleasant-looking black, leafless tree standing to the east.  The wide dirt road, though not frequently travelled, is still quite distinctive, since no plants have grown up in its surface yet.  An eerie blue fog swirls all around, growing thicker to the east and south to the point that passage is impossible in those directions.

North.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the north.

West.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the west.

rooms.name: The Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: A wide dirt road, hardly more than a trail, runs east to west here.  To the east, barely visible through the creeping blue fog swirling all round, the trail makes an abrupt turn.  Loud, running water can be heard to the west.

East.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the east.

West.description: You see a sturdy-looking bridge to the west.

rooms.name: The Northern Bridge
rooms.description: A sturdy stone bridge spans a roaring river.  The loudness of the running water and the constant spray from it hitting the bridge indicate that the river isn't very far down.  In fact, a clear path leading down to it from the side of the bridge.  The swirling blue fog rising up from the trail to the east and west also seems to arise from the ancient stones of the bridge, as well.

East.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the east.

West.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the west.

Down.description: You see the Blue-Fog River roaring by below you.

rooms.name: The Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: A wide dirt trail runs from east to west.  Though once it may have been very frequently travelled, it now seems to have fallen into disrepair and disuse. There is no sign of what may lie beyond the swirling blue mists that rise up from the very ground, but loudly running water can be heard to the east.

East.description: You see a sturdy-looking bridge to the east.

West.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the west.

rooms.name: The Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: This wide dirt road was obviously once well-traveled, but now there are few recent footprints or wheel-ruts.  There are no specific boundaries at the road's sides -- it just stops at that width.  A curling blue fog rises up from the ground, obscuring almost everything in sight.

East.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the east.

West.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the west.

rooms.name: A Bend in the Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: This wide dirt road runs from east to south through a strangely swampy region.  The ground is quite damp, and the air is cloying with the humidity of the swirling blue fog that seems to come from absolutely nowhere.  There is very little traffic through here, as is evidenced by the lack of recent footprints and wheel-prints.

East.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the east.

South.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the west.

rooms.name: The Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: A wide dirt road runs from the north to the south through the dense, swirling fog that seems everywhere.  Sunlight can't even reach through this fog to the trail's surface, and there is no sign of what kind of terrain stands to the east or west.  To the north, barely visible through the fog, the trail makes an abrupt turn, but no details are visible from here.

North.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the north.

South.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the south.

rooms.name: The Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: A wide dirt road runs from the north to the south through some damp but otherwise featureless terrain.  Nothing is visible, in fact, except the road itself, and not much of that, since the view is obscured badly by thick, swirling blue fog that rises up from the very ground.

North.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the north.

South.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the south.

rooms.name: The Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: The only thing visible here at all is a wide dirt road running from north to south.  The sky isn't visible, nor whatever lies at the sides of the strange trail, because of an eerie, unnatural- seeming light blue fog that rises up from the ground, swirling so densely that nothing is truly clear.

North.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the north.

South.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the south.

rooms.name: The Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: A wide, largely unused trail runs from north to south through here, through damp, almost swampy dirt.  Whatever's at the side of the road is obscured by rolling blue fog that obliterates all detail, as are things that are far away. The old footprints and wheel ruts from long ago indicate that once this trail was widely travelled, but now there is little traffic along it.

North.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the north.

South.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the south.

rooms.name: A Turn in the Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: This wide dirt road makes an abrupt turn here, going from north to east. There is little indication of what may lie outside the trail, thanks to an eerie blue-glowing fog that rises up from the very ground, swirling densely and obscuring all vision.

North.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the north.

East.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the east.

rooms.name: The Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: A wide dirt road, clearly in disuse and disrepair, runs from east to west from here.  The only thing visible at all is the road itself; there are no signs at all of what lies on the large trail's sides, or even what kind of terrain the trail runs through.  The noise of running water, and a ponderous creaking sound, come from the east.

East.description: You see a rickety looking rope bridge to the east.

West.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the west.

rooms.name: The Rickety Rope Bridge
rooms.description: A short, very poorly constructed rope bridge spans a narrow crevasse in a wide dirt road's way.  Below, a roaring river flashes past, with sprays of plumed waves coming up to buffet the thick ropes of the bridge's surface.  A thick, swirling fog rises up from the surface of the water and of the bridge, but it breaks just enough for a way to the riverside below to be visible.

East.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the east.

West.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the west.

Down.description: You see the Blue-Fog River roaring by below you.

rooms.name: The Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: A wide dirt road runs from east to west through here.  There is little sign of what may lie beyond that road, thanks to an all- obscuring light blue fog that curls up from the very ground.  The sounds of running water and the creaking of something old come from the west.

East.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the east.

West.description: You see a rickety looking rope bridge to the west.

rooms.name: The Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: A wide, largely unused dirt road runs from east to west through terrain that can't be identified.  Very old wheel ruts in the road indicate that at one time it was very widely travelled, though now there is little evidence of activity. There's no sign at all of what may lie beyond the trail, thanks to an all-obscuring light blue fog that swirls all around you.

East.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the east.

West.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the west.

rooms.name: A Bend in the Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: This wide dirt road makes an abrupt turn here, running from south to west. There's no way of telling what the trail is making a turn to avoid, nor of even what kind of terrain lies outside the road's surface.  There is little sign of traffic along the road, indicating that it is not often travelled.  By far the strangest thing about this road, however, is the curling blue mists that swirl up from the very surface of the road.

South.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the south.

West.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the west.

rooms.name: The Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: A wide dirt road, largely unused and in bad condition, runs from north to south through damp, marshy ground.  In some places, an old, crusty footprint or wheel rut can be seen, indicating that at one time, this road was frequently travelled, but now there is little traffic at all.  A swirling light blue fog, dense and humid, rises up from the very ground.

North.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the north.

South.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the south.

rooms.name: The Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: A wide dirt road runs from north to south from here.  Though at one time it was travelled often, as is evidenced by very old wheel-ruts running through it, now there is little traffic at all along it.  Indeed, it is hard to tell even what kind of terrain runs along the road, thanks to an obscuring blue fog that swirls up from the very ground that conceals almost everything about this place.

North.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the north.

South.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the south.

rooms.name: The Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: A wide dirt road, disused and in shoddy condition, runs from north to south through damp, marshy ground.  It's impossible to tell what kind of terrain lies outside the road's boundaries.  In fact, all that's visible is the road itself, and not much of that, since a swirling light blue fog rises up, dense and obscuring, from the very ground.

North.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the north.

South.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the south.

rooms.name: The Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: This wide dirt road runs from north to south through increasingly swampy ground.  The dampness of the area has totally obliterated any signs of previous travellers' passage, though it's obvious, from the deserted nature of the road, that few use it.  There's no way of telling what kind of terrain lies beyond the edges of the road, since a dense, swirling light blue fog rises up from the ground, making visibility all but nonexistent.

North.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the north.

South.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the south.

rooms.name: The Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: A wide dirt road runs through damp ground, to the north and south.  There is little evidence of traffic along it, though all footprints and wheelruts are long obliterated.  The road exists almost as a tunnel through a dense blue fog that obscures everything around you.

North.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the north.

South.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the south.

rooms.name: The Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: This wide dirt road runs from the north to the south through very damp terrain.  There are no signs of any real traffic here, though the ground, which is nearly mud, doesn't seem able to hold prints for very long.  A dense, curling blue fog rises up from the ground to obscure almost everything except this patch of road.

North.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the north.

South.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the south.

rooms.name: The Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: A swirling blue fog obscures most of this dirt road, which runs north-south through very damp ground.  All evidence of previous traffic has been obliterated by the swampiness of the road.  An eerie blue fog rises up from the ground, curling in tendrils in pretty patterns, and thoroughly obscuring whatever lies ahead, or even on the sides, of the road.

North.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the north.

South.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the south.

rooms.name: The Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: The trail runs north-south from here and is covered with fog.

North.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the north.

South.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the south.

rooms.name: The Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: A thick blue miasma of fog rises up in tendrils from the ground, obscuring almost everything around here.  The only thing that's visible, in fact, appears to be the road itself -- a wide but otherwise nondescript dirt road with no demarcating boundaries or special markings anywhere that goes from north to south.  The sky is not visible from here, nor whatever terrain lies outside the marshy ground of the trail.

North.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the north.

South.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the south.

rooms.name: A Turn in the Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: The wide, marshy road makes an abrupt turn here, heading from north to west, though there's no sign, through the light blue fog curling everywhere, of what caused the sudden turn, nor even what terrain the road is taking its travelers through.  There is little evidence of any recent traffic through here, but, of course, the ground is quite damp and muddy.

North.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the north.

West.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the west.

rooms.name: The Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: A wide muddy road runs from east to west here, through an impossibly thick, curling blue fog that seems to rise up from the very ground.  There is little evidence that anybody's been past here in some time, but, of course, the ground is quite marshy, so it's hard to tell.  The road exists as a kind of dream-tunnel, with the sky and the land surrounding it being impossible to see. The sound of rushing water comes from the west.

East.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the east.

West.description: You see a sturdy-looking bridge to the west.

rooms.name: The Southern Bridge
rooms.description: A sturdy grey stone bridge stands atop a roaring river that cuts through the wide muddy road running east to west through here.  The thick granite stones have begun to erode from time and the passage of such fast-moving water; though here and there a rectangular block has grown round-edged and possibly even nicked, the bridge as a whole appears quite safe.  A little trail through the mud at its edge leads downward to the river's side; however, there is no place to stand there without a boat.

East.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the east.

West.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the west.

Down.description: You see the Blue-Fog River roaring by below you.

rooms.name: The Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: A wide, muddy road leads from east to west through incredibly thick, light blue fog that swirls everywhere, obscuring visibility badly.  Little can be ascertained about the road's origins, source, or destination, or indeed, even what terrain it leads through, for the fog cannot be pierced enough to show what lies beyond the plain trail's unmarked boundaries.  The sound of rushing water comes from the east.

East.description: You see a sturdy-looking bridge to the east.

West.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the west.

rooms.name: The Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: A wide, muddy road runs from east to west through here.  It doesn't show many signs of recent use, though, since the ground is very marshy, footprints wouldn't show as readily.  An eerie blue fog rises up from the very ground, obscuring almost everything, including the sky and the lands beyond the road.

East.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the east.

West.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the west.

rooms.name: A Bend in the Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: This wide, muddy road makes an abrupt turn here, though it's impossible to say what caused the abrupt shift -- the unnatural blue fog that curls up from the ground makes it impossible to tell what lies beyond the road's unmarked dirt boundaries.

East.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the east.

South.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the west.

rooms.name: The Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: A wide, muddy road runs from the north to the south through land that's obscured completely by an eerie blue fog that rises, thick and curling, from the very ground.  The road itself is all that's visible here, almost like a tunnel.  Its boundaries are unmarked, if they exist at all, but the fog prevents breaking them.

North.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the north.

South.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the south.

rooms.name: The Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: A wide, muddy road runs from north to south through an unnatural, thick blue fog that curls up from the ground and obscures everything around the trail. There is little evidence of traffic on the road, though, of course, with its muddy surface, it'd be hard to tell.  Other than the fog, there's nothing at all special about the road.

North.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the north.

South.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the south.

rooms.name: The Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: A thick, muddy trail runs from north to south through a dense, eerie blue fog that seems to come from the very ground, and gets thicker the nearer the edges of the trail one approaches.  There's no way at all to penetrate the invisible boundary of the trail, and no way even to tell what kind of land lies beyond it.  The road itself seems not often traveled, with little traffic visible along it, and few footprints in its marshy surface.

North.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the north.

South.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the south.

rooms.name: The Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: A wide road, obviously fallen into disuse, runs north to south through marshy ground.  There are no indications of where the road's edges are, though a dense, eerie blue fog rises up from the ground and grows thicker the further away from the center of the road one tries to travel.  It's impossible to penetrate the fog and leave the trail -- or even to see what land it's taking its travelers through.

North.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the north.

South.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the south.

rooms.name: A Turn in the Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: The wide, muddy road makes an abrupt turn here, heading north and east. There's no indication at all of what caused the shift in direction, since the blue fog rising up from the ground is so thick that it's impossible to tell what lies beyond the road.  Even the sky is impossible to see, through the tendrils of light blue mist.

North.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the north.

East.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the east.

rooms.name: The Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: A wide, marshy road runs from east to west through the extremely thick, light blue fog that swirls up from the clammy ground itself.  It is impossible to tell what kind of terrain lies beyond the simple, clearly unused merchant road.  Waves can be heard to the east.

East.description: You see the western end of the Blue Lake Bridge.

West.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the west.

rooms.name: The Western End of the Blue Lake Bridge
rooms.description: You are standing at the western end of the Blue Lake Bridge, a magnificent achievement of stoneworking craftmanship and magic combined.  The many interlocking granite flagstones of the bridge are slightly worn at the corners, but it looks like it's in excellent shape overall.  The bridge extends eastward for some ways, across a very wide lake.  An odd light blue fog swirls up from its surface, curling in the air, and getting denser to the west, where a wide, muddy road begins.  Steps cut into the bridge's edge lead down to the lake.

East.description: You see the Blue Lake Bridge continuing on to the east.

West.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the west.

Down.description: You see the Blue Lake beneath you.

rooms.name: The Blue Lake Bridge
rooms.description: You are standing near the center of the Blue Lake Bridge, a magnificent achievement of stoneworking craftmanship and magic combined.  The many interlocking granite flagstones of the bridge are slightly worn at the corners, but it looks like it's in excellent shape overall.  The bridge extends east and west a bit, across a very wide, clear lake.  An odd light blue fog swirls up from its surface, curling in the air, and getting denser to the west, where a wide, muddy road begins.  Steps cut into the bridge's edge lead down to the lake.

East.description: You see the Blue Lake Bridge continuing on to the east.

West.description: You see the western end of the Blue Lake Bridge.

Down.description: You see the Blue Lake beneath you.

rooms.name: The Blue Lake Bridge
rooms.description: You are standing near the center of the Blue Lake Bridge, a magnificent achievement of stoneworking craftmanship and magic combined.  The many interlocking granite flagstones of the bridge are slightly worn at the corners, but it looks like it's in excellent shape overall.  The bridge extends east and west a bit, across a very wide, clear lake.  An odd light blue fog swirls up from its surface, curling in the air, and getting denser to the west, where a wide, muddy road begins.  Steps cut into the bridge's edge lead down to the lake.

East.description: You see the Blue Lake Bridge continuing on to the east.

West.description: You see the Blue Lake Bridge continuing on to the west.

Down.description: You see the Blue Lake beneath you.

rooms.name: The Center of the Blue Lake Bridge
rooms.description: You are standing in the center of the Blue Lake Bridge, a magnificent achievement of stoneworking craftmanship and magic combined.  The many interlocking granite flagstones of the bridge are slightly worn at the corners, but it looks like it's in excellent shape overall.  The bridge extends east and west a bit, across a very wide, clear lake.  An odd light blue fog swirls up from its surface, curling in the air, and getting denser to the west, where a wide, muddy road begins.  Steps cut into the bridge's edge lead down to the lake.

East.description: You see the Blue Lake Bridge continuing on to the east.

West.description: You see the Blue Lake Bridge continuing on to the west.

Down.description: You see the Blue Lake beneath you.

rooms.name: The Blue Lake Bridge
rooms.description: You are standing near the center of the Blue Lake Bridge, a magnificent achievement of stoneworking craftmanship and magic combined.  The many interlocking granite flagstones of the bridge are slightly worn at the corners, but it looks like it's in excellent shape overall.  The bridge extends east and west a bit, across a very wide, clear lake.  An odd light blue fog swirls up from its surface, curling in the air, and getting denser to the west, where a wide, muddy road begins.  Steps cut into the bridge's edge lead down to the lake.

East.description: You see the Blue Lake Bridge continuing on to the east.

West.description: You see the Blue Lake Bridge continuing on to the west.

Down.description: You see the Blue Lake beneath you.

rooms.name: The Blue Lake Bridge
rooms.description: You are standing near the center of the Blue Lake Bridge, a magnificent achievement of stoneworking craftmanship and magic combined.  The many interlocking granite flagstones of the bridge are slightly worn at the corners, but it looks like it's in excellent shape overall.  The bridge extends east and west a bit, across a very wide, clear lake.  An odd light blue fog swirls up from its surface, curling in the air, and getting denser to the west, where a wide, muddy road begins.  Steps cut into the bridge's edge lead down to the lake.

East.description: You see the eastern end of the Blue Lake Bridge.

West.description: You see the Blue Lake Bridge continuing on to the west.

Down.description: You see the Blue Lake beneath you.

rooms.name: The Eastern End of the Blue Lake Bridge
rooms.description: You are standing at the eastern end of the Blue Lake Bridge, a magnificent achievement of stoneworking craftmanship and magic combined.  The many interlocking granite flagstones of the bridge are slightly worn at the corners, but it looks like it's in excellent shape overall.  The bridge extends west quite a ways, across a very wide, clear lake.  An odd light blue fog swirls up from its surface, curling in the air, and getting denser to the west, where a wide, muddy road begins.  Steps cut into the bridge's edge lead down to the lake.

East.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the east.

West.description: You see the Blue Lake Bridge continuing on to the west.

Down.description: You see the Blue Lake beneath you.

rooms.name: The Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: A wide, muddy road runs from east to west through dense, swirling blue fog that appears to rise from the very ground.  Though at one time the road may have been well traveled, as indicated by the sheer size of it, there is little evidence of recent traffic through it.  The thick, eerie fog makes it impossible to tell just what kind of terrain the road traverses, or what may lie beyond it.  From the west emanates the gentle sound of waves on a small body of water.

East.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the east.

West.description: You see the eastern end of the Blue Lake Bridge.

rooms.name: A Bend in the Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: The wide, muddy road makes an abrupt bend here, from south to west, though there is no way of telling the cause for the shift in direction.  Eerie, unnatural-seeming blue fog curls up in tendrils from the ground, obscuring whatever lies beyond the simple trail's boundaries.  The sky isn't even visible through that dense fog.

South.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the south.

West.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the west.

rooms.name: The Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: A wide, muddy road runs from north to south through some very marshy ground. Though once this road might have been popular, now there is little sign of recent activity along it, except some animal prints and some odd sliding ruts that aren't from wheels.  An eerie blue fog obscures most details, including any view of the land beyond the road.

North.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the north.

South.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the south.

rooms.name: The Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: A wide, muddy road runs north-south through marshy terrain.  It's impossible to tell what may lie beyond the road, due to an eerie light blue fog that rolls in from the roadsides, getting thicker the further from the road's middle one approaches.  There is little sign of recent activity on the road, though, it certainly is large enough to be a more established merchant road.

North.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the north.

South.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the south.

rooms.name: The Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: A wide road runs from north to south through here.  Once it may have been frequently travelled, though now it's fallen into obvious disuse.  It's impossible to tell what kind of land lies beyond the trail's dirt borders, thanks to a dense blue fog that seems to rise up out of the muddy ground, curling so thickly that little can be seen at all.

North.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the north.

South.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the south.

rooms.name: The Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: A thick blue fog seems to cover this simple, wide dirt road, making it seem almost like a tunnel through the light blue.  Nothing is visible beyond the road's simple boundaries; in fact, the fog grows denser the close to the edge of the road one approaches.  The only place there is any kind of visibility is the center of the road, and that's little enough as it is.

North.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the north.

South.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the south.

rooms.name: The Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: A wide dirt road seems robed in rolling blue fog that comes out of nowhere to obscure visibility in all directions.  The road, running north-south through the fog, doesn't seem remarkable at all, save for its size and the fog that drapes it.  Its sides are unmarked, being simply where the marshy ground leaves off, but it's impossible to see what may lie beyond those sides.

North.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the north.

South.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the south.

rooms.name: The Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: A largely abandoned muddy road runs north-south through thick, eerie blue fog that comes out of nowhere to obscure vision and render unseeable the terrain that lies beyond the road's simple borders, so the trail seems almost like a tunnel through the pale blue fog.  The footing grows increasingly muddy to the south.

North.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the north.

South.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the south.

rooms.name: The Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: A wide, muddy road, once perhaps a merchant trail, now has largely fallen into disuse.  There is little to suggest recent traffic here, since the road's surface is so muddy that few prints have held up to the rigors of time.  It is impossible to tell what kind of terrain the road traverses, thanks to an eerie, light-blue fog that curls up from the ground, growing denser the closer to the roadside one tries to approach.  The fog makes this trail seem almost like a tunnel.

North.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the north.

South.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the south.

rooms.name: The Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: A wide, muddy road runs to the north and south through some very marshy ground.  The mud here is almost liquid, and of that rich, brown color that bespeaks very fertile ground.  However, there's no sign of what may lie beyond the road, thanks to a very dense blue fog that curls up from the clammy, wet mud of the road to obscure everything beyond the middle of the trail.  A gentle, almost inaudible thrumming noise seems to pervade this part of the trail; it seems to grow louder to the south.

North.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the north.

South.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the south.

rooms.name: The Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: A wide, muddy road runs from north to south through swampy terrain.  Muck clings to virtually everything here, making it impossible to see footprints. A thick blue fog seems to rise through the mud, further obscuring visibility, and it's growing thicker to the south.  Also to the south, a loud thrumming noise is audible.

North.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the north.

South.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the south.

rooms.name: The Blue-Fog Trail
rooms.description: You are standing at what appears to be the end of a wide, muddy road. Thick mud squelches almost of its own accord, ending with precision right at a thick wall of fog to the south.  The wall shimmers and pulses with silvery lights, and more fog seems to dance around it, joining with that of the road itself.  The road does run to the north, but that's the only way away from for the fog also prevents passage to the west.  Loud thrumming noise seems to be coming from the wall to the south.  Perhaps waving away the fog will have some effect, perhaps not.  There is a small temple to the east which might lead to information on the mists south.

North.description: You see the Blue-Fog Trail continuing on to the north.

rooms.name: An Elevated Slope
rooms.description: The fog is thick here, hiding the true elevation of the path below.  To the south the land can be seen to be higher than to the north.  There is thick woodlands to the east and west, mostly obscured by the omnipresent fogs.  The path continues to the north and the south.

rooms.name: A Turn in an Elevated Path
rooms.description: The fog is thick here, hiding the true elevation of the path below.  To the south the land can be seen to be higher than to the north.  There is thick woodlands to the west and to the south, mostly obscured by the omnipresent fogs.  The path continues along to the north and east, through less thick fog.

rooms.name: A Turn in an Elevated Path
rooms.description: The fog is thick here, hiding the true elevation of the path below.  To the south the land can be seen to be higher than to the north.  There is thick woodlands to the east and north, mostly obscured by the omnipresent fogs.  The path becomes more muddy and sticky to the south, and is a little more firm to the west.

rooms.name: A Turn in an Elevated Path
rooms.description: The fog is thick here, hiding the true elevation of the path below.  To the south the land can be seen to be higher than to the north.  There is thick woodlands to the east and north, mostly obscured by the omnipresent fogs. There is a steep climb in the path to the east, where as it declines slightly towards the north where the fog is thinner.

rooms.name: A Steeply Rising Section of the Mist Path
rooms.description: There is a steep rise in the path here.  The mist is heavy, slightly clouding the walk to the west, yet it is even more thick above.  There are some sickly looking trees, gnarled roots sticking up out of the ground that almost seem to move in the mist.  The path continues to the west, or rises steeply above.

rooms.name: A Rising Section of the Mist Path
rooms.description: This section of the Mist Path is very foggy, mist swirling all around at the slightest perturbation.  The land slopes up towards a peak high above and mostly out of sight due to the clouds and mist.  The ground is hard and trees twisted.  The path continues off below and to the east where it rises further.

rooms.name: A Rising Section of the Mist Path
rooms.description: This section of the Mist Path is very foggy, mist swirling all around at the slightest perturbation.  The land slopes up towards a peak high above and mostly out of sight due to the clouds and mist.  The ground is hard and trees twisted.  The path continues off to the south and to the west, where the fog is thick and looks like a forbidding wall.

rooms.name: A Rising Section of the Mist Path
rooms.description: This section of the Mist Path is very foggy, mist swirling all around at the slightest perturbation.  The land slopes up towards a peak high above and mostly out of sight due to the clouds and mist.  The ground is hard and trees twisted.  The path rises quite steeply to the immediate south, and slopes down a bit north.

rooms.name: A Turn in the Mist Path
rooms.description: The path bends here, leading north and west.  There is quite a bit of mud for some reason around here, puddling in one or two places.  There are some gnarled trees surrounding the path, but otherwise there is little else.

extras.text: The mud is thick, gooshing around anything that comes in contact with it. There are several small puddles of it , seemingly footsteps of something large.

rooms.name: A Turn in the Mist Path
rooms.description: Gnarled trees shroud overhead, leaning down from overhead.  Their twisted branches occasionally reaching out almost as if they were alive.  The mists to the south and west are very heavy, though they are thinner to the north. Above and east continues the mist path, where the mist is thinnest of all.

rooms.name: A Steep Rise in a Mist Path
rooms.description: This portion of the path is hardly a path at all, it is nearly sheer cliff! Below is the hard ground and the tops of some dark trees.  The cliff face proceeds above and below, making climbing rather difficult on foot.

rooms.name: A Very Steep Rise in the Mist Path
rooms.description: This portion of the path is hardly a path at all, it is nearly sheer cliff! Far below is the hard ground and the tops of some dark trees.  The cliff face proceeds above and below, making climbing rather difficult on foot.  The mist here is nearly absent, thick in only a few small patches.  Yet there is enough of the mist to make the rock slick and quite dangerous.

rooms.name: The Top of a Steep Drop in the Mist Path
rooms.description: The mist path drops sharply below, nearly vertically as it descends through some tree tops to some more level ground.  The path extends also through some light fog to the east.  There is an opening in the trees and shrubbery allowing a peek at the large mountain to the south.

rooms.name: A Bend in the Mist Path
rooms.description: This is yet another turn in the Mist Path.  It continues to lead mostly to the south towards the large mountain which can be seen in that direction. There is a break in the tree lines through which the path runs west and south of here.

rooms.name: A Thickly Fogged Section of Path
rooms.description: The fog is so incredibly thick here that no clear definition can be seen on anything more than a few inches away.  Vague outlines of trees can be seen, but little more than that.  The mist is thick and damp, acting almost as a heavy weight.  The dark outline of trees suggests the path runs north and south only.

rooms.name: A Bend in a Foggy Section of the Mist Path
rooms.description: The ground below is soft and muddy, caused by the constant, unwavering damp of the fog.  The dark outline of trees suggests that this poor excuse for a path continues north and west.  The trees themselves seem to reach in, arching narrowly over the pathway.

rooms.name: A Foggy Section of the Mist Path
rooms.description: The fog here is thick, seeming to absorb nearly every bit of light and sound daring enough to filter through the tall trees.  The ground is soft and the path is not well defined.  Apparent from the lack of tree shadows to the east and west suggest the path runs in those directions.

rooms.name: A Foggy Section of the Mist Path
rooms.description: The fog here is thick, seeming to absorb nearly every bit of light and sound daring enough to filter through the tall trees.  The ground is soft and the path is not well defined.  Apparent from the lack of tree shadows to the east and west suggest the path runs in those directions.

rooms.name: A Bend in a Foggy Section of the Mist Path
rooms.description: The fog is thick and unyielding.  Light trickles down from the sky and a slight wind sounds to be ruffling the branches of the tall, dominating trees. The path through the mist rises very suddenly, allowing passage east and up from here.  The muddy path going up is difficult to walk on.

rooms.name: The Mist Path
rooms.description: The fog is much less thick here compared to just below along the steep slope of the path.  The trees are visible stretching south of here, along the muddy path.  There is a slight groan as some of the branches around shift and twist unnaturally.  The town of Mielikki can be seen in the far distance to the north from this vantage point.  The surrounding countryside is large, and even some of the largest elements of the land can be seen far north.

rooms.name: The Mist Path
rooms.description: The mist path is a simple trail running between some trees along the side of this heightening mountain.  The slope of the mist path continues to lead upward to the peak.  The trees have begun thinning out, becoming more and more scarce. The path continues upward to the south, and to lower elevations north.

rooms.name: A Bend in the Mist Path
rooms.description: The path continues to rise to the west of here and heads down to the north. The trees are thinly spaced at this elevation.  Far to the north can be seen much of the land, even faint hints of cities north of Mielikki are visible.

rooms.name: The Mist Path
rooms.description: The Mist Path runs east and west here.  The trail is rather bland and uneventful.  Winding from side to side ever so slightly is the most interesting feature.  Assist solm the elevation rises, the air becomes more and more thin. There is a thick cluster of trees just south of the trail, but even they look rather drab.

rooms.name: A High Section of the Mist Path
rooms.description: This High Section of the path circles a bit to the north and west before sweeping off to the east and south.  There is a rather sheer drop off just beyond where the path is to the north.  A sharp crag juts from the top of the cliff, leaning out over certain peril below.  The path itself if actually rather dusty here, occasionally allowing bits of itself to be blown away over the cliff edge.

rooms.name: A High Section of the Mist Path
rooms.description: The Mist Path continues to the north and south of here.  A few bushes line the edges of the path, preventing passage east and west.  The path itself is rather dry, seeming to resist the mist's attempt to dampen it.  A bizarre little purple flower peaks from beneath one of the bushes.

extras.text: This flower is rather small and pointy.  It has large leaves for the size of the stem.  Both the leaves and the stem are a dull, purple hew, while the bud of an omni-present flower atop the stem is a much more lush purple.

rooms.name: A Turn in a High Section of the Mist Path
rooms.description: This is yet another turn in the Mist Path, which continues running up to the summit of the mountain.  The peak is shrouded from this vantage point in a thick fog, which is never quite eaten away by the sun, no matter how brightly it shines.  There are some slight tendrils of mist reach out from all around. The path continues north and east from here.

rooms.name: A High Section of the Mist Path
rooms.description: The slope of the Mist Path increases to the east of here, slanting quickly down to a turn in the path to the west.  There are some minor weaves in the path here, but nothing significant.  Some trees can be seen in a tight clump to the north of here, but are not accessible from this vantage point, which is nearly two thirds of the way up the trees.

rooms.name: A Dizzying Height on the Mountain of Mist
rooms.description: The steep rise in the path from the west grows even steeper here, rising nearly vertically upward.  The path at this point is not much more than a sheer collection of stones worn smooth by the weather.  A mountain goat may even have trouble keeping its footing on this kind of surface.

rooms.name: The Mountain of Mist
rooms.description: From the steepness of the path directly leading downward, the path north is remarkably level.  It is almost as if the path stops rising for a brief moment before continuing on at a steeper grade to the top.  On this rather flat spot there is what appears to be the remains of an old camp, there are remains of a firepit and even a cleared off spot perfect for sleeping upon.  All around that little clearing the ground is scattered with loose rock and sharp nettles.

rooms.name: The Mountain of Mist
rooms.description: The path on the Mountain of Mist continues to rise in what now seems to be circles to the summit.  The path occasionally zigzags upward to make the going a little less steep and more climbing-friendly.  The path descends slightly to the south and rises higher to the north.

rooms.name: A Turn on the Mist Path
rooms.description: The path comes to an abrupt turn, now leading away from here to the east and to the south.  It continues to rise to the east and leads back toward the lower elevations to the south.  Some vague whisps of smoke can be seen far, far to the north, rising from what is likely the city of Mielikki.  Much of the Blue Fog Lake can be seen to the north and west of here, as can parts of the river flowing south.

rooms.name: The Mist Path
rooms.description: The path continues east and west of here, rising to the east toward the top of the Mountain of Mist.  Not far in either direction are yet more turns in the path, west of here leading down to the lower lands and east rising up to the heavens.  Many of the rocks of the path poke viciously from the dirt in which they are housed and threaten to break through even tough leather boots.  There are some specks of sand which are a bit out of place this far from any open water.

rooms.name: A Turn on the Mist Path
rooms.description: The path again takes a turn, this time leading back down the mountain to the west and higher up to the north.  The terrain here is rather rugged and broken. There is some evidence that a little creek once ran down the path, as it cut some small grooves in the dirt until it broke off and flowed away.

rooms.name: A Path of the Mountain of Mist
rooms.description: There is dense fog clouding the path here, making it nearly impossible to see further than a few inches.  There are many creaking sounds about, some sounding assist solm though limbs of trees and bushes are scraping against one another, but there are also other sounds which are not quite distinguishable. Though it can barely be seen, the path runs north and south of here, descending to the south and beginning to again rise steeply to the north.

rooms.name: A Turn on the Mist Path
rooms.description: The trail continues on here, rising up steeply to the east and declining to the south.  A thick, heady fog can be seen to the south, filling an entire section of the path and making it impossible to see through.  The rock of the trail here is rather thick and rugged, not allowing easy passage.  There are some bits of grass and tufts of weeds sticking out from either side of the trail.

rooms.name: A High Section of the Mist Path
rooms.description: This section of the Mist Path runs east and west.  The rise in the elevation to the east is rather substantial, much more so than the decline to the west. There are some thin whisps of fog and mist floating about, nor really enough to impede movement or vision.  For some reason the grasses on either side of the worn path are rather tall right around here, and they seem to lean in toward the path and there are signs that they have begun to encroach upon the trail itself, which has become narrow.

rooms.name: A High Section of the Mist Path
rooms.description: A single, large, sharp stone juts directly from the center of the path, which has been widened by many feet over the years walking around it.  The stone is a rich grey, mottled and hard.  The coloring of this stone contrasts all of the other stones around, which are mostly a dark color shale.  There seems to be a little carving on the side of the stone facing to the lower part of the mountain.  There is a dark, reddish smear across some of the darker rocks all around.  The path continues to the east and west, rising up toward the peak to the east.

extras.text: The little carving on the side of the large, sharp stone is an ancient, dead text.  Next to the writing is a little carving of what appears to be a giant lizard of some indistinguishable form.  The other little rocks about truly look to be blood-stained from many years ago, as the weather has nearly washed them clean.

rooms.name: A High Section of the Mist Path
rooms.description: The Mist Path continues along east and west.  At this point all of the trees on the lower parts of the mountain are well below.  Some faint tendrils of smoke can be seen far to the north of here, reaching toward the heavens.  To the south looms the peak of the Mountain of Mist.  Rising toward it is the path to the east, otherwise the path west leads down from the mountain.

rooms.name: A Turn in a High Section of the Mist Path
rooms.description: This is a quite high section of trail, falling off sharply to the north and not quite so sharply to the east.  There are some ragged crags sticking up all about, most threatening shoes daring enough to tread upon them.  The path leads away from this turn to the west back down the trail and south leading further up the Mountain of Mist.

rooms.name: A High Section of the Mist Path
rooms.description: This section of mountain rises only slightly, in stark contrast to the north and south of here.  There are some small bits of vegitation struggling to make a living in this high, rather barren climate.  The dust of the north-south running path threatens to snuff out the little plants entirely.

rooms.name: A High Section of the Mist Path
rooms.description: As to the north, many little plants are struggling to survive in this harsh, cooling climate.  There are some very short strands of grass covering the surroundings aside from on the path itself.  Many formerly sharp rocks jut from the grass, pretending to be menacing as they once were before erosion melted them away over the years.  The path continues north to lower elevations and south rising up further.

rooms.name: A Steeply Rising Section of the Mist Path
rooms.description: Some cute little tendrils of mist whisp back and forth, fleeing abruptly from any movement.  The portions of exposed ground reveal a tender little blanket of moss growing over much of the surroundings.  The moisture from the mist undoubtedly allows the little mosses to flourish.  The Mist Path turns north-west here, leading downhill to the north and up toward the summit to the west.

rooms.name: A Steeply Rising Section of the Mist Path
rooms.description: The path rises very sharply above, leading up to higher and higher elevations.  The mists are thin here, yet damp and make the mostly smooth surfaces of the rocks slippery and more dangerous than usual.  The path leading east slopes down the mountain.  There are some rugged hand-holds carved into the formerly sharp rocks, allowing for some vertical movements.

rooms.name: A Steep Section of the Mist Path
rooms.description: This Mist Path practically falls away below, leading downward very steeply and then on to lower elevations.  Some bits of grey rock are scattered about, almost seeming to be out of place.  These rocks look very much like the mists of the area in color and hew, and those further away almost appear to move or shudder on occasion.  The path leads down and to the north, through some thicker mists.

rooms.name: A Bend in the Mist Path
rooms.description: The mists are thicker here, compared to both west and south of here.  Range of vision is severely limited, yet the faint outline of the path curving west and south can scarcely be seen on the earth.  North and east appears to fall off down the sides of the mountain.  There is a sound which is very similar to the sound of more and more rocks falling from somewhere nearby.

rooms.name: A Bend in the Mist Path
rooms.description: The mists are strangely mostly absent here.  East of this point the mists are heavy and thick, for no apparent reason, yet here there are hardly any signs of it.  The path curves broadly for such a steep elevation, leading off to the east and south again.  The peak rises high above yet, to the south, extending several meters into the air above here.

rooms.name: A High Section of the Mist Path
rooms.description: The Mist Path rises steadily to the summit to the south, while declining to the north.  There are some small pebbles scattered across the path, seeming to run in a little zig-zag pattern, very similar to that of a lightning bolt. The pebbles are black, grey, and a variety of brighter more pleasant colors. There is a single large stone standing off to the side of the path, out of the way, yet still grabs hold of the eye upon passing it.  There is just something rather peculiar about how it is balanced on a narrow section and widens as it rises higher.

rooms.name: A Bend in the Mist Path
rooms.description: This is a slight bend in the Mist Path.  From here, down to the lower parts of the mountain can be seen distantly.  There are small chunks of broken rock littering about, scaring the landscape.  The path runs to the north and west of here, beating through the little tufts of grass which are trying their hardest to survive.  Fortunately for the grasses, the occasionally heavy mists provide good moisture on which they can thrive.

rooms.name: A Bend in the Mist Path
rooms.description: The Mist Path takes a sharp turn here, curving from east to south again. It continues to wind up the mountain toward the summit, occasionally rising more steeply than in other places.  There is some evidence of vague animal markings etched forever into the compacted dirt of the path, undoubtedly set in a time long ago when there was more moisture dampening the soil.  Small rocks border around the tracks, almost as though they have been here as long as the tracks themselves.

rooms.name: An Extremely High Section of the Mist Path
rooms.description: The height that this path has risen to is incredible.  The relatively flat lands can be seen far below, some plowed and tended.  Many of the other lands simply stretch wide and far, including into the swamplands far to the north. A deep ravine in the earth can be seen to the east of here, cutting deeply into the ground.  The Mist Path continues to run north and south of here, sloping toward the lowlands to the north and higher to the south.

rooms.name: A Turn in the Mist Path
rooms.description: The turns in the path are much more concise and wander about less than they do in the lower elevations.  The path declines to the north and runs up toward the summit, quite steeply, to the east.  A large building can be seen far to the west as nothing more than a small, child-sized toy from this distance. Beyond that building glares the bright yellow reflection of hot sands, as well as a mighty stone pyramid rising from them.

rooms.name: An Extremely High Section of the Mist Path
rooms.description: The Mist Path rises sharply above, leading directly to the top of this great mountain.  There is nothing very significant about the immediate surroundings, aside from the bit of cliff leading upward.  The path travels downward toward the lowlands to the west.  The heights have made the oxygen thin here, causing difficulty building a fire -- or for some breathing.  There are some small shards of rock which appear to have chipped off of the larger rocks leading up the path.

rooms.name: Near the Top of the Mountain of Mist
rooms.description: This is very near the summit of the Mountain of Mist.  The mountain itself barely extends any further into the air above, but plummets to the ground far below.  Giant trees on the fringes of the grasslands look like nothing more than a small tinder-twig at this height.  Other than looking directly toward the mountain peak, distances for miles around can be seen.  The Mist Path runs down to lower elevations and east toward the summit.

rooms.name: Near the Top of the Mountain of Mist
rooms.description: This is just below the very peak of the mountain.  The path which leads far from Mielikki to here is very wide considering the lack of space around this close to the top.  There are scarcely any signs of vegetation about, let alone any trees or heavy foliage.  The path leads back downward to the west and to the summit directly south.

rooms.name: The Peak of the Mountain of Mist
rooms.description: The view from this point is tremendous.  The town of Mielikki can be seen in the distance to the north.  Further north and far to the west of that is what appears to be Anduin, sprawled over a large mountain side.  Distantly south can be seen vast ocean and some hilltops.  All around are fields and little speckles of town or village as far as the eye can see.  The mists are relatively thin here, fondling your ankles and barely covering the tips of the grass and sharp bits of rock sticking up from the mountain top.  The mountain slopes down on all sides.

rooms.name: Near the Peak of the Mountain of Mist
rooms.description: The peak is very near, just up above.  Even below the very top of the mountain, things can be seen for miles around.  The path winds about in a few little loops, leading away both up and west of here.  The way up is a little steep and rocky compared to the west passage through the little grasses.

rooms.name: Very Near the Peak of the Mountain of Mist
rooms.description: Some small grasses threaten to pop out of the ground along side the path. The path cuts through all foliage leading away east and south from here.  The little bits of rock and pebbles are scattered about haphazardly on and around the path, making even a tough leather boot have to work hard.  There is little evidence of anything other than dirt and grass here.

rooms.name: A Sudden End of the Mist Path
rooms.description: The Mist Path comes to an abrupt halt here, proceeding no further to the south or in any other direction for that matter.  There is a small break in the rock face to the west, perhaps large enough to squeeze through.  The rock is a sharp tan color, reflecting the bizarre glow from the mist which is heavy all around.  The trees border every escape aside from the one to the north and the rock wall to the west.

extras.text: There is a small hole in the wall, perhaps large enough for a person to squeeze through.  The jagged rocks would be painful if they somehow grabbed some skin on the way through.  Inside through the hole is a dark cavern.

rooms.name: The Entrance to the Misty Cave
